page.title: 07FISH FARM TULLACH ARD
page.content: The fish farm was started in 1978 by Mr and Mrs Stewart.They have 1300 fish which eat 33lbs of food a day.The food is made of fish meal,soya bean fish oil and crushed shrimps.It costs about Â£500 a ton. Their biggest success was when they sold lots of disease free eggs at a great profit.Their biggest fish weighed 30lbs. Mr Stewart gets the salmon when they are smolt.He breeds them then sells the eggs to other fish farms. In December he strips the females of their eggs which he puts in fresh water.He gets milk from the males to fertilize them. The main predators are the heron and the otter.
